title: The Contagious Myth – Vermont Independent
cleaned_text:
Beginning with a beautiful reality. Each our bodies are self-organizing systems. In our gloriously flawed evolutionary uniqueness, we are each comprised of (give or take) 6 trillion cells, 60 trillion bacteria, and 180 billion viruses.

Dr. Zac Bush elegantly explains – with a message of hope and healing as we enter what promises to be a turbulent year.

And here are DOZENS of ways to treat COVID-19 (and all other viral infections) without Physical Distancing, Masking, Locking Down, Staying Home and Consuming the “News” while waiting for the CDC and the WHO to tell you it is OK to again resume living a Fully Human life.

While we keep one eye on what appears to be a “Color Revolution” unfolding in the US Empire’s DC Beltway, a CR built on a Constitutional Crisis two decades in the making, we are keeping our other eye on the COVIDtastrophe as it continues to unfold in our Green Mountains.

As we reported in our four part 2020 COVID EMPIRE series, the Transhumanist Technocrats (TechnoFascism, for short) are knocking at our Civilizational Door, and #TeamHuman has some difficult choices to make in 2021 and Beyond here in our Green Mountains.

Look no further than the Rockefeller Foundation’s December 2020 report entitled Taking Back Control: A Resetting of America’s Response to Covid-19, promising 1) increased PCR testing (scientifically nonsensical above 32 cycles, and deeply corrupt from a policy POV); 2) more and more ‘vaccines’ – meaning untested mRNA gene-altering injections; 3) more and more surveillance; 3) more and more economic centralization and control – all in the name of “resetting America’s response to the COVID.”

Well well well. See below.

Some sanity, in the form of a single number, is in order.

As former New York Times journalist Alex Berenson writes in his “must read” 2020 UNREPORTED TRUTHS ABOUT COVID-19 pamphlet, “the most fundamental unreported truth about the coronavirus [is that] about 999 out of 1,000 people who get it will survive.”

“999 out of 1,000 people who get the coronavirus will survive.” – Alex Berenson

Berenson’s work parallels our own research here at Vermont Independent – captured in our “Beyond COVIDphobia” Op/Ed from last spring 2020 – see below. As we enter 2021, nearly a year of global data collection has only strengthened our ELEVEN conclusions.

In the face of Science and Sanity, COVIDiopaths like the Rockefeller Foundation plan to move forward with their “Taking Back Control” viral agendas in 2021. Time for #ViralResistance.

Meanwhile, in the UK, the British government is moving from the viral sublime to the corona ridiculous.

Two questions for any independent-minded Vermonter.
• How will WE end this COVIDtastrophe here in Vermont?

2. What can each of US do to Make Vermont Human Again?

This FREE VT 2021 Open Thread will be devoted to providing ideas and resources exploring answers and solutions. More and more Vermonters of Courage and Conscience are asking these same questions, as evidenced by the formation of groups such as 802Freedom, V4Vermont, and Beyond. Join and support them! #MutualAid #ViralResistance

Big Picture: After close to a year of data collection, with the 4th Industrial Revolution’s “Great Reset” lurking in our Civilizational Wings, it seems apparent that the dire consequences of WHO/CDC viral protocols far outweigh promised benefits. Consider just one authoritative source – Dr. Denis Rancourt – whose ongoing scientific reviews have shed light on said consequences. His exhaustive new “Review update of recent science relating to COVID-19 policy” report, courtesy of PANDA (Pandemics Data and Analysis), is worth a close read. His conclusions will come as no surprise to regular VI readers – but for those who are interested in “listening to the science,” Rancourt’s conclusions are vital for making Vermont Human again.

And here are links to our ongoing VI reporting on the COVIDtastrophe – organized by both “search term” and our latest 2020 article – we’ll add new 2021 stories below each category as they come in.

Masking and our Last 2020 Article

THE BLAZE: Comprehensive Analysis of 50 states shows greater spread with mask mandates (Dec 21, 2020)

PCR ‘Testing’ and our Last 2020 Article

SEVEN DAYS article: From October 2020 explaining why Vermont is using (“scientifically nonsensical” – our words) PCR tests rather than Rapid Antigen tests. (January 15, 2021)

WHO: Just admitted a “Problem” with the PCR tests. Huh. (January 25, 2021)

RHODE ISLAND CENTER FOR FREDOM & PROSPERITY: After 1,000 email requests by a “persistent citizen,” epidemiologist Dr. Andrew Bostom, the RI government finally released 2020 data re: PCR testing cycle thresholds (ct) – and surprise! (January 28, 2021)

DR. SAM BAILEY: New Zealand GP discusses history and efficacy of PCR testing. (January 18, 2021)

Economic Lockdowns and our Last 2020 Article

IVOR CUMMINS: Informative history of the origins of the “economic lockdown of healthy Humans to suppress a virus” policy – from Xi’s PRC to The WHO to much of the Western world. (January 20, 2021)

UNHERD TV: UK indy journalist Freddie Sayers discusses new viral strains and the “uncontainability” of the corona virus, with David Engelthaler, co-director of the T-Gen Research Institute and former state epidemiologist of Arizona, and asks the question – Are lockdowns a threat to human rights?” – with human rights lawyer Adam Wagner. (January 18, 2021)

TOM WOODS: Wide ranging conversation with attorney Chris Ferrara, special counsel with the Thomas More Society, who is successfully challenging COVID lockdown restrictions on religious grounds, as well as other legal options. (January 18, 2021)

“Vaccines” and our Last 2020 Article

CHILDREN’S HEALTH DEFENSE: “The COVID ‘Vaccine’ (AIR QUOTES) On Trial” – remarkable 2 hour virtual panel of researchers, doctors, and medical professionals taking a “deep dive” into the V. (February 14, 2021)

DAVID MARTIN: New Fauci CVOVID-19 dossier for all freedom-loving lawyers, policymakers, medical professionals and citizens and his YT interview here. (January 20, 2021)

NEW YORK TIMES: “Underselling The Vaccine.” (January 18, 2021) – Weigh NYT claims about “vaccines” with observations made by lawyers, doctors, and researchers below.

Author JASON SHURKA/RFK: Useful historical and medical overview of the emergence of US vaccine safety movement. Highlights of their discussion include:
• The movement began among parents of vaccine-injured children who started doing their own research of peer-reviewed science which was at odds with what federal health agencies were telling the public.
• Parents of vaccine-injured children can’t accurately be called “anti-vaxers” but are in fact “ex-vaxers.” If federal regulatory agencies want to effectively address vaccine hesitancy, they can start by being honest.
• Classifying vaccines as biologics vs. medicines eliminates the need for adequate safety testing. The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services has never conducted the vaccine safety studies required by the National Childhood Vaccine Injury Act of 1986.
• With federal health agencies holding patents on vaccines, regulatory function has been eclipsed by the profit motive. (January 18, 2021)

RFK/MARTIN/MIKOVITS PANEL: David Martin et al lay out the legal and medical case for not calling CV “vaccines” actual vaccines, but instead, to refer to them as “pathogen manufacturing sites.” SHORT – MUST WATCH. This so-called “vaccine” is in actuality, Martin says, “a chemical pathogen device that is meant to unleash a chemical pathogen production action within a cell – it is not a living system, it is an invasive medical technology.” “A synthetic pathogen,” states Dr. Mikovits. “You are getting injected with a substance to produce illness,” says Martin, “with your own cells making you sick.” (January 18, 2021)

DAVID MARTIN WORLD: University of Virginia’s Dr. David Martin argues that legally, COVID-19 “vaccines” are, in reality, gene-therapy technologies with no proof of prevention for either infection by or transmissibility of SARS CoV 2, in the words of Moderna and Pfizer as published in the New England Journal Of Medicine (December 2020). In this video, Martin reviews Pfizer/ Moderna Product Description and FDA illegal approval, despite (TO REPEAT) NOT designed to “Prevent Infection or Stop Transmission of a Virus” using experimental Gene Therapy. PS: Remember, under 1986 VICA and 2005 PREP ACT, Big Pharma is not legally liable for harm caused to the “vaccine / gene-therapy injected. (January 16, 2021) SCREEN SHOT from Martin’s YouTube video page below.

TOM COWAN: Dr. Thomas Cowan, co-author of THE CONTAGIOUS MYTH, explores the “science of mRNA vaccines.” (January 15, 2021)

THE HIGH WIRE / CHILDREN’S HEALTH DEFENSE: Subscribe to television producer Del Bigtree’s weekly news show THE HIGH WIRE and US environmental litigator Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s CHILDREN’s HEALTH DEFENSE – for up-to-date news on vaccine safety, pharmaceutical industry watchdogging, and the best in “terrain theory” journalism. (January 15, 2021)

CARRIE MADEJ: Dr. Carrie Madej on how COVID-19 “vaccines” ‘reprogram’ our cells without informed consent (January 15, 2021)

AFD: “America’s Frontline Doctors” Dr. Simone Gold’s January 2021 deep dive lecture into the COVID-19 “vaccine” (NOTE: Google now identifies Dr. Gold as an “insurrectionist” because she was in DC on January 6th – Orwell is rolling…) (January 15, 2021)

LAW FIRMS DOT COM: CDC Members Own More Than 50 Patents Connected To Vaccinations (January 15, 2021)

THE CENTRE FOR RESEARCH ON GLOBALIZATION: 10 Things All Humans Should Know About Experimental COVID-19 “Vaccines” (January 13, 2021)

The 4th Industrial Revolution’s “Great Reset” Human/Machine Synthesis, Nanos/Microchips, and our Fave 2020 Article and Fave 2020 interview (RFK, Jr. and Catherine Austin Fitts)

UNLIMITED HANGOUT: Deep Dive FEATURE into the history of Klaus Schwab and the World Economic Forum. (February 27, 2021)

WRENCH IN THE GEARS: Citizen researcher Alison McDowell of Wrench In The Gears takes a deep dive into “Digital Vaccines” and Beyond in this mind-expanding presentation about the financial and ethical particulars of the 4th Industrial Revolution’s ‘Great Reset.” Bring a pencil. Take notes. (January 27, 2021)

TECHNOCRACY NOW: Unfamiliar with the acronyms IoB, 5G and IOT? Eye opening analysis of how the” Internet of Things” (IoT) is merging with the “Internet of Bodies” (IoB) through the deployment of powerful new 5G telecommunications technologies. (January 18, 2021) With a picture!

FRANCES LEADER: Email Exchange With UK MHRA – Exposing the genomic sequence of SARS Cov2 – in which Leader, a UK citizen journalist, confirms that novel corona virus SARS CoV2 “vaccine” has been “created from a computer generated genomic sequence & not one isolated from an infected person, either in Wuhan or anywhere else in the world since.” (January 18, 2021)

TAIWAN NEWS: WHO inspector caught on camera revealing Gain of Function (GOF) research to manipulate corona viruses in Wuhan prior to “pandemic.” (January 20, 2021) Helpful excerpt from article below:

The average American Human reads one book a year. We’re gonna suggest all Vermonters read TWO books to begin 2021: The Invisible Rainbow: A History Of Electricity And Life, and The Contagion Myth: Why Viruses (including “Coronavirus”) Are Not the Cause of Disease.

Our very Lives and Livelihoods here in the Green Mountains depend on independent thinking, aggressive questioning, thoughtful research, and vigorous public debate.

Jan 4th: Here’s the brilliant Ivor Cummins summarizing the scientific data re: the “novel corona virus” looking back – curious – how it has replaced the traditional flu in the data.

Jan 2nd – Video Interview with Sally Fallon and Dr. Thomas Cowan about their new book THE CONTAGION MYTH, with helpful summary.

Thomas S. Cowan, MD, and Sally Fallon Morell ask the question: are there really such things as “viruses”? Or are electro smog, toxic living conditions, and 5G actually to blame for COVID-19?

The official explanation for today’s COVID-19 pandemic is a “dangerous, infectious virus.” This is the rationale for isolating a large portion of the world’s population in their homes so as to curb its spread. From face masks to social distancing, from antivirals to vaccines, these measures are predicated on the assumption that tiny viruses can cause serious illness and that such illness is transmissible person-to-person.

It was Louis Pasteur who convinced a skeptical medical community that contagious germs cause disease; his “germ theory” now serves as the official explanation for most illness. However, in his private diaries, he states unequivocally that in his entire career he was not once able to transfer disease with a pure culture of bacteria (he obviously wasn’t able to purify viruses at that time). He admitted that the whole effort to prove contagion was a failure, leading to his famous death bed confession that “the germ is nothing, the terrain is everything.”

While the incidence and death statistics for COVID-19 may not be reliable, there is no question that many people have taken sick with a strange new disease—with odd symptoms like gasping for air and “fizzing” feelings—and hundreds of thousands have died. Many suspect that the cause is not viral but a kind of pollution unique to the modern age—electromagnetic pollution. Today we are surrounded by a jangle of overlapping and jarring frequencies—from power lines to the fridge to the cell phone. It started with the telegraph and progressed to worldwide electricity, then radar, then satellites that disrupt the ionosphere, then ubiquitous Wi-Fi. The most recent addition to this disturbing racket is fifth-generation wireless—5G. In The Contagion Myth: Why Viruses (including Coronavirus) are Not the Cause of Disease, bestselling authors Thomas S. Cowan, MD, and Sally Fallon Morell tackle the true causes of COVID-19.

On September 26, 2019, 5G wireless was turned on in Wuhan, China (and officially launched November 1) with a grid of about ten thousand antennas—more antennas than exist in the whole United States, all concentrated in one city. A spike in cases occurred on February 13, the same week that Wuhan turned on its 5G network for monitoring traffic. Illness has subsequently followed 5G installation in all the major cities in America.

Since the dawn of the human race, medicine men and physicians have wondered about the cause of disease, especially what we call “contagions,” numerous people ill with similar symptoms, all at the same time. Does humankind suffer these outbreaks at the hands of an angry god or evil spirit? A disturbance in the atmosphere, a miasma? Do we catch the illness from others or from some outside influence?

As the restriction of our freedoms continues, more and more people are wondering whether this is true. Could a packet of RNA fragments, which cannot even be defined as a living organism, cause such havoc? Perhaps something else is involved—something that has upset the balance of nature and made us more susceptible to disease? Perhaps there is no “coronavirus” at all; perhaps, as Pasteur said, “the germ is nothing, the terrain is everything.”
